readable.title: 3269087421_1d489abeae
readable.content: A man in a flowered shirt holds a microphone beside a violin player standing in a crowd of people . A man is holding a violin whilst the woman plays it with the bow . A man plays a violin at a concert while a man speaks into a microphone . A violinist and a singer perform in front of people . one man singing next to another man playing the violin .
